resources.string: Please check that the information are correct
Please complete the victim\'s identification form

In order to help the Red Cross to identify the victims, it is recommended to give as much information as possible. By giving read and write access to files, this identification work will be greatly facilitated

In order to help the Red Cross to identify the victims, it is recommended to give as much information as possible. By taking a picture of the body, this identification work will be greatly facilitated

In order to help the Red Cross to identify the victims, it is recommended to give as much information as possible. By giving the location of where the body was found, this identification work will be greatly facilitated

In order to help the Red Cross to identify the victims, it is recommended to give as much information as possible. By giving the permission to record audio, this identification work will be greatly facilitated
The file access permission was revoked. In order to use the application, you need to provide the permission from your phone settings
The camera permission was revoked. In order to use the application, you need to provide the permission from your phone settings
The location permission was revoked. In order to help the Red Cross to identify the victims, you should provide the permission from your phone settings
The microphone permission was revoked. In order to help the Red Cross to identify the victims, you should provide the permission from your phone settings
Please enter your phone\'s country code and serial number
Is this number: %s correct ?\nBe aware that you cannot change it later
OCDC accepts only letters, digits and dashes
Changes will not be saved.\nDo you want to continue ?
Error : Picture file could not be created
Error : The images\' directory cannot be created
Error : The images\' directory cannot be accessed
Once a photo is deleted, it can\'t be recovered. Do you want to continue ?
Once a case is deleted, it can\'t be recovered. Do you want to continue ?
Once an audio file is deleted, it can\'t be recovered. Do you want to continue ?
Error : The directory to store the case cannot be created
Error : The pictures cannot be saved
The data could not be loaded
The JSON data could not be parsed

A folder containing all your files will be created and can be exported by: USB, email or bluetooth. If the file remains in your phone for more than %d hours, it will be encrypted and you will have to contact the ICRC to decrypt it. Make sure that the authorities are ready to receive the file.
A case needs at least one photo
Add a picture to the case
A button to delete the picture
Displays tag information to help filling the form
Displays the photo gallery to overview pictures
Displays the audio list and player
Save the case into phone memory
Deactivate the password protection for zipped files
